name: Rouge
overview:
Rouge was an English-language Action/Adventure television series from Singapore that ran on both Channel 5 and throughout Southeast Asia on MTV Asia in 2004. The show also ran in Australia and the United States.

The 13-part series follows a Southeast Asian all-girl rock band who are also high-tech special operatives working for a global crime-fighting organization, as they take on a counter-espionage network known as "The Brotherhood."
